flavor: You don’t know the house from which you’re descended. At least, you’re not sure. Maybe it’s one of the famous names. Maybe it’s a minor family. Maybe your ancestry is so mixed up you can trace your bloodline to a dozen houses. When asked, you tend to pick a noble house as the mood suits you, and sometimes you make one up on the spot just to sound impressive.Do you want to learn your true ancestry? How would you react if your true ancestry were established? Are you hiding something by lying about you family line?
name: House Of Lies
